elambaemin aththe kumakdayi owunge anathuru angawim thibiyadi pawa pa්ramukha banku ha mulya aayathana, wyasanaye magehima gaman ganna athara, “sangithaya wadanaya kerena thak durata oba nagi sita natiya yuthuya, api thawamath natamin sitinnemu” yana 2007di sitigaෲp pa්radhaniyage kupa්rakata pa්rakasha sihiyata nanwayi. 2008 mulya arbudaya amarikanu ha jathyanthara kamkaru panthiya mawithayata pathkala athara owun, elambai samaja wyasanayata muhuna dimata sudanamwa sitiye natha.

oostreliya mahadwipaye nitha aatha pihiti kuda dupathwala saranagathayin padinchi kara wima amanushika kriyawak bawath, wisheshayen lamun ewani parisarayaka randawa thabima “sharirika menma manasika kalathiya hewath chiththa pidawata” lak kirima apa wisin nokala yuthu wadak bawath mage hangimayi yanuwen ohu emangin agamathiwarayata penwa di atha.

ekama thathwayak thiyeddith,eka shalawaka minissu sathutin innath anith shalawe minissu dukin innath hethuwa ohuta hithagannata bariwela.“me wenasata hethuwa mokakda?kotinma me aya sathutin inna hethuwa mokakda?me ayatath anith shalawe ayata wagema hariyata aahara ganna baha neda”kiyala eya ahala.“ee thamayi sathuta saha duka athara habama wenasa kiyala” shanthuwaraya pilithuru dunnalu.“ee aya ekinekata aahara kawa gaththa” ohu kiyala.
